alert.note: Alert for Clay; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Clay, northwestern Otter Tail, northeastern Wilkin and southwestern Becker Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Downer, or 20 miles southeast of Fargo, moving east at 15 mph. Other strong storms with a history of producing wind gusts to near 50 remain in the Sabin area. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Barnesville, Hawley, Glyndon, Sabin, Baker, Downer and Averill. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 6 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
